name: Alien Adventure (Alexander Voit)
description:
The main character is an alien (Player), who travels across the galaxy. The spaceship crashes on one of the planets. Right before the crash, our alien (Player) catapulted from the spaceship. When the spaceship landed on the planet, all its parts got scattered around the city not far from the shipwreck location. The local inhabitants are hostile and want to attack our alien every time they see him/her.

Goals: Our alien (Player) must find his ship and all the parts scattered around the area  to obtain the tools to fix his spaceship to return home
